snippet: The state is investigating whether child-protection officials falsified records to qualify for millions of dollars in federal money.
abstract: Authorities in Georgia are investigating whether former officials of the state's Division of Family and Children Services falsified records to qualify for millions of dollars in federal money.
lead_paragraph: The state is investigating whether child-protection officials falsified records to qualify for millions of dollars in federal money.

headline.main: Georgia: Fraud Suspected at Family Services
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Fraud Suspected at Family Services
